nodes.text: 44-ND was a probe droid in the service of the Sith Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic.

Admiral Hestun used 44-ND to contact Imperial operatives via the droid's in-built hologram, recruiting an Imperial strike force to disable three Republic anti-aircraft emplacements on Corellia, as well as using the tags provided by 44-ND to mark Imperial aerial-bombardment targets on the world by hiding beacons within designated Republic encampments. Targets included a Jedi encampment, that of the Green Jedi, and a Republic Comm Station.
According to the game's conversation files, 44-ND was originally named NN-4D.
